title: Sitting down & Invention that has changed the world

singleItemContent: Where is your favorite place to sit ?
Do you always sit down for a long time?
Do you feel sleepy when you are sitting down?
When you were a kid, did you usually sit  on the floor?
Describe an invention that has changed the world in a positive way
How it influences people of different ages
And explain how  it changed people’s lives
What is the most helpfu; innovation at home?
What household appliances makes us lazy?
What kind of invention can beused at school?
Do you thik AI will replace human teachers? Why?
